explains: n. 克制，抑制；控制，限制；管制措施，制约因素；<正式>（武力）阻止，制止；座椅安全带，安全装置；（尤指艺术表达中的）低调处理
wordGroup: without restraint 无拘无束地；自由自在地
restraint of trade n. 贸易管制

sentences.en: She has been saintly in her self-restraint.
sentences.cn: 她一直似圣徒般能自我克制。

sentences.en: They behaved with more restraint than I'd expected.
sentences.cn: 他们表现了比我预想还多的克制。

sentences.en: He exercised considerable restraint in ignoring the insults.
sentences.cn: 他表现出极大的克制，没去理会种种侮辱。
